component.title: AWS Simple Workflow
component.description: The aws-swf component is used for managing workflows from Amazon Simple Workflow.
component.label: cloud,workflow

amazonSWClient.description: To use the given AmazonSimpleWorkflowClient as client

dataConverter.description: An instance of com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.DataConverter to use for serializing/deserializing the data.

eventName.description: The workflow or activity event name to use.

version.description: The workflow or activity event version to use.

bridgeErrorHandler.label: consumer
bridgeErrorHandler.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler which mean any exceptions occurred while the consumer is trying to pickup incoming messages or the likes will now be processed as a message and handled by the routing Error Handler. By default the consumer will use the org.apache.camel.spi.ExceptionHandler to deal with exceptions that will be logged at WARN/ERROR level and ignored.

exceptionHandler.label: consumer,advanced
exceptionHandler.description: To let the consumer use a custom ExceptionHandler. Notice if the option bridgeErrorHandler is enabled then this options is not in use. By default the consumer will deal with exceptions that will be logged at WARN/ERROR level and ignored.

exchangePattern.label: consumer,advanced
exchangePattern.description: Sets the exchange pattern when the consumer creates an exchange.

clientConfigurationParameters.label: advanced
clientConfigurationParameters.description: To configure the ClientConfiguration using the key/values from the Map.

startWorkflowOptionsParameters.label: advanced
startWorkflowOptionsParameters.description: To configure the StartWorkflowOptions using the key/values from the Map.

sWClientParameters.label: advanced
sWClientParameters.description: To configure the AmazonSimpleWorkflowClient using the key/values from the Map.

synchronous.label: advanced
synchronous.description: Sets whether synchronous processing should be strictly used or Camel is allowed to use asynchronous processing (if supported).

activityList.label: consumer,activity
activityList.description: The list name to consume activities from.

activityThreadPoolSize.label: consumer,activity
activityThreadPoolSize.description: Maximum number of threads in work pool for activity.

childPolicy.label: producer,workflow
childPolicy.description: The policy to use on child workflows when terminating a workflow.

executionStartToCloseTimeout.label: producer,workflow
executionStartToCloseTimeout.description: Set the execution start to close timeout.

signalName.label: producer,workflow
signalName.description: The name of the signal to send to the workflow.

stateResultType.label: producer,workflow
stateResultType.description: The type of the result when a workflow state is queried.

taskStartToCloseTimeout.label: producer,workflow
taskStartToCloseTimeout.description: Set the task start to close timeout.

terminationReason.label: producer,workflow
terminationReason.description: The reason for terminating a workflow.

workflowList.label: consumer,workflow
workflowList.description: The list name to consume workflows from.
